2.text: Speak to your classmates and find someone who…………
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Speak to your classmates and find someone who…………</prosody></speak>

3.text: • gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning. • comes to school by train. • studies early in the morning. • likes to play badminton. • goes to temple/kovil/church/mosque once a week. • likes to act in dramas. • celebrates Deepavali. • fasts at Ramazan. • observes sil on Poya days. • sings carols at Christmas.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>• gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning. • comes to school by train. • studies early in the morning. • likes to play badminton. • goes to temple/kovil/church/mosque once a week. • likes to act in dramas. • celebrates Deepavali. • fasts at Ramazan. • observes sil on Poya days. • sings carols at Christmas.</prosody></speak>

4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Do you ...............................? e.g. :- Do you get up at 5 o'clock?</prosody></speak>

6.text: Present your findings to the class.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Present your findings to the class.</prosody></speak>

7.text: e.g. :- Yoga gets up at 5 o'clock.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. :- Yoga gets up at 5 o'clock.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Now write down your findings in your exercise book. One student should write at least 3 sentences.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Now write down your findings in your exercise book. One student should write at least 3 sentences.</prosody></speak>
